body: Daylight dimming using EnergyPlus, not Radiance, possible? Getting back into HB and I did not come across how to set daylight dimming for the purpose of lights energy calculation in the tutorials. Still in the works? Keep up the good work, LB-HB team!

replies.body:
Hi Arpan,

We don't support EnergyPlus daylight calculation yet. There are open issues on github but is not on top of the list right now.

Mostapha
